name: Shambler
description: A rotting Parisian, still dressed in the tattered remains of everyday clothes. Moves slowly but relentlessly.

name: Runner
description: Recently turned. The muscles haven't fully decayed yet. It sprints at you with terrifying speed, jaw snapping.

name: Bloater
description: A grotesquely swollen corpse, distended with gas. Its skin is translucent and pulsing. Do NOT let it get close.

name: Crawler
description: A legless torso dragging itself across the ground. Hides under cars and debris. You don't see it until it grabs your ankle.

name: Zombie Horde
description: A mass of writhing bodies moving as one. Dozens of dead eyes, hundreds of grasping fingers. There is no running from this.

name: Le Revenant
description: This one is different. Its movements are almost... deliberate. Its wounds knit closed before your eyes. Something ancient stirs behind those dead eyes.
